title: Shortest Path in Unweighted Graph
statement: Given an unweighted undirected graph with V vertices and E edges, find the shortest path (number of edges) from source vertex S to destination vertex D.
input_format:
First line contains V, E, S, and D.
Next E lines contain two integers U and V representing an edge.
output_format: Print the shortest path length. Print -1 if no path exists.
